abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: (a) a concrete
            dam about 45 meters high which would form a reservoir
            adequate for yearly regulation of river water at Mtera; (b)
            an extension of the existing Kidatu hydroelectric generating
            station by two 50-MW units; (c) a 90 MVA transformer at
            Morogoro; (d) consulting services; and (e) training for
            TANESCO's mid-management and professional staff.
